about_the_game:
Ever dreamt of being the lead character in the Jetsons, a Top Gun or in an 80s cool nightdrive? Now you can do all at once. With Metapilot Academy - Airtaxi Coach you can now learn about becoming an airtaxi pilot or manufacturer, for free! Diana is trained on the latest airtaxi flight manuals and regulatory manuals for training.

We've partnered with top airtaxi and aerospace firms to let you race and fly cutting-edge flying cars, well before they're commercially available. This game, crafted with insights from industry experts, promises a riveting adventure around the iconic Manhattan skyline.

What better way to relax AND train as a future Metapilot? Your mission is to race the different airtaxi models across environments, an on the real world map in the premium version. Enjoy the free version, and get the paid version to start earning tokens. You'll have access to the real world map,
Then go to our website and sign up for Metapilot tokens. Get our premium soundtrack, get into the Metapilot Academy with our Airtaxi Coach and share your reviews across all platforms to become a Metapilot ambassador!

  • Processor: Core i3-8100
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 670 and above
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • VR Support: OpenXR
